laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: The white blood cell count increased from 0.587 × 10^3/µL to 4 × 10^3/µL after treatment with G-CSF.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Hypercellular marrow with small lymphoid aggregates of large pleomorphic cells.
Majority of lymphoid cells positive for B-cell marker CD20; CD3+ T cells were scattered and CD30 stains were negative.
Epstein-Barr virus genome detected in lesional skin.
Mass in the right axilla and adenopathy of the right axillary, right hilar, and right inguinal areas; spleen was slightly enlarged.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Repeat scans showed resolution of the axillary mass and adenopathy.
